name: Fearless Fryer
description:
Fearlessly fry along the highway to the donut zone! Or perish in a glaze of glory.... Donut blink or you'll miss the action in this high flying  shmup! 

Arrived super deep fried and late, may continue to patch and add new features in the future.
Download for the optimal play experience :)

This was our first game jam, so we hope y'all enjoy,

Thanks for playing!


Credits:
Programming - Matt Religioso (Instagram)
Art - Herrick Ong  (Twitter) (Tumblr)
Music - James Pacquing
